title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles model weights, config & data into a single Modelfile; drop-in replacement for OpenAI endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async APIs, streaming support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool to chat, manage models & pull new ones from the registry.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama chat and image-to-text via slash commands.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with decorators.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama with context cancellation.

title: ollama-hub
summary: Curated registry of community Modelfiles and fine-tuned adapters.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for LLM-based testing.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with IAsyncEnumerable streaming and ASP.NET Core sample.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async client and strongly-typed request/response structs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC caching.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama API for Rails apps with ActiveModel-style interface.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that threads Ollama responses and allows per-channel model settings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.
